title: Council Regulation (EC) No 3089/95 of 21 December 1995 allocating, for 1996, catch quotas between Member States for vessels fishing in Polish waters
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC)  No 3089/95
of 21 December 1995
allocating, for 1996, catch quotas between Member States for vessels  fishing in Polish waters
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: 1. From 1 January to 31 December 1996, vessels flying the flag of a  Member State are hereby authorized to make catches in waters falling within the fisheries  jurisdiction of Poland and within the quota limits set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1995.
For the Council
The President
L. ATIENZA SERNA
(1) OJ No L 389, 31. 12. 1992,  p. 1. Regulation as amended by the 1994 Act of Accession.
(2) OJ No L 261, 20.10.1993, p. 1.
ANNEX
Allocation of Community catch quotas in Polish waters for 1996
>TABLE>
